page.title: 03Crop spraying (cont'd)
page.content: For Wheat it is{Tilt Turbo Fungicide that stops various{diseases.} {Cyclocell }Growth Restricter = shorter strain . {Herbicides }such as {M P C A are to kill weeds .{Azatox}poison compound is to kill{Aphids. {We asked for comments on the opinions. 1. Farmers have to spray their crops to make sure that insects don't ruin them. 2. Farmers should not spray from the air. 3.We have to use planes because its quicker. 4.It is dangerous to peoples healh to spray crops . 5.We have to spray crops to get cheap vegetables . 6.Some sprays are dangerous and should be banned. {results overpage
